name: Mew
flavorText:
So rare that it
is still said to
be a mirage by many experts. Only
a few people have
seen it worldwide.

previous.name: Mewtwo
previous.flavorText:
It was created by
a scientist after
years of horrific gene splicing and
DNA engineering
experiments.
